prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that has a spooky appearance and mischievous personality.
Imagine a Pokemon with a dark purple body and glowing red eyes, perfect for haunting shadows.
Show me a ghost Pokemon that looks playful, with a wide grin and a floating form.
Generate a Pokemon with a rounded body, sharp teeth, and a playful yet creepy vibe.
Make a design for a ghost-type with an eerie smile and a shadow-like silhouette.
I want a Pokemon that has a spooky but fun appearance, featuring purple and red colors.
Design a ghostly creature with distinct features like pointed ears and a shadowy tail.
